doc:
Erich Bergen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erich_Bergen 0 Erich Bergen (born December 31, 1985) is an American actor and presenter, best known for his role as Bob Gaudio in the biographical musical drama film Jersey Boys and for his role as Blake Moran in the CBS television series, Madam Secretary. He attended the Stagedoor Manor Performing Arts Center in Loch Sheldrake, New York for seven years. His other credits include Gossip Girl, Desperate Housewives, Person of Interest and Franklin Bash. Bergen currently appears on the CBS television series Madam Secretary as Blake Moran, personal assistant to fictionalized Secretary of State Elizabeth McCord (played by Téa Leoni).In 2013, Bergen was diagnosed with testicular cancer and went through chemotherapy.He recently announced that he is joining the cast of Waitress, starring as Dr. Pommater. He attended the_Stagedoor_Manor Performing Arts_Center in Loch_Sheldrake , New_York for seven_years . His_other_credits include Gossip_Girl , Desperate_Housewives , Person of Interest_and_Franklin_ . Bergen currently appears on the_CBS_television_series_Madam_Secretary as Blake_Moran , personal_assistant to fictionalized_Secretary of State_Elizabeth_McCord (_played by Téa_Leoni_) . In 2013 , Bergen was_diagnosed with testicular_cancer and went through chemotherapy.He recently announced that he is_joining the_cast of Waitress , starring as Dr._Pommater .
